io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.events

Interface NucleusAFKEvent.NotifyCommand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.spongepowered.api.event.Event, org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.TargetEntityEvent, org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.TargetHumanoidEvent, org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.TargetLivingEvent, org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.player.TargetPlayerEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    NucleusAFKEvent

    @MightOccurAsync
public static interface NucleusAFKEvent.NotifyCommand
extends org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.player.TargetPlayerEvent
    Fired when the target of a command is AFK and the command is marked as one that should notify the sender.
